xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/824834-Bending Space: Georges Rousse And The Durham Project 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/c92FLOHp3GmxDGqEratrsFPVYDz.jpg Bending Space: Georges Rousse and the Durham Project captures the genius of French photographer and installation artist Georges Rousse and follows the artist and two hundred volunteers during a September 2006 public art residency in Durham. The film includes interviews with Rousse, project coordinators and volunteers, and people on the street as they visit the installations. Bending Space: Georges Rousse And The Durham Project
